text: avaru kayuttiruvudu avara balige malakâ€Œgalu barabeku athava saksat nim'ma odeyane barabeku athava nim'ma odeyana kelavu puravegalu barabeku embudakke tane? Nijavagi, nim'ma odeyana kelavu puravegalu bandu biduva dina, modale nambike ittillada athava tanna nambikeya mulaka olitannu sampadisillada yarigu avara nambikeyinda yavude prayojanavagadu.
